character_vault.name: Oliver
character_vault.description: Male, 8 years old, Caucasian, slim build, average, light, fair skin, short light brown straight slightly messy hair, blue round eyes, light, straight eyebrows, small nose, small lips, clean_shaven, wearing light blue short-sleeve blue t-shirt (loose fit, short sleeves, crew neck), dark blue dark jeans (fitted fit, full length), white white sneakers (casual), smiling, casual style, youthful aesthetic , high quality , detailed character design , consistent style , professional illustration headshot , head and shoulders view

core: short light brown straight slightly messy hair
notes: 'Light' appears multiple times; interpreted as fair skin and light-colored eyebrows
'Caucasian' aligns with fair skin but not listed as a facial trait
Clean-shaven is expected for an 8-year-old but included for completeness

character_vault.name: Captain James
character_vault.description: Male, 45 years old, Caucasian, average build, tall, average, tanned skin, short dark brown straight neatly combed hair, hazel narrow eyes, thick eyebrows, large nose, thin lips, dark brown stubble (short stubble), wearing white white collared shirt (loose fit, long sleeves, collar neck), navy blue navy blue trousers (loose fit, full length), navy blue navy pea coat (wool), black black boots (casual), white white captain's hat, silver watch (silver), serious, nautical style, professional aesthetic , high quality , detailed character design , consistent style , professional illustration headshot , head and shoulders view

core: short dark brown straight hair, neatly combed
notes: Skin tone described as tanned; mapped to tan
Repeated/duplicated color words in clothing (e.g., 'white white', 'navy blue navy blue')

character_vault.name: The Red Balloon
character_vault.description: Other, round build, average, light, bright red latex with solid, string, whimsical aesthetic , high quality , detailed character design , consistent style , professional illustration headshot , head and shoulders view

core: no visible hair, eyebrows, or eyes
tied latex nozzle at base of face
volatile: thin string attached below the nozzle
notes: Inanimate balloon character; age band not truly applicable (adult used as placeholder).
No explicit facial features are present; description implies a featureless face.
Primary color is bright red, which is not in the skin_tone enum; mapped to 'other'.
'Head and shoulders' is metaphorical for a balloon headshot.

character_vault.name: Jenna
character_vault.description: Female, 28 years old, Caucasian, athletic build, average, average, light skin, medium dark blonde wavy pulled back in low ponytail hair, green almond eyes, arched eyebrows, pointed nose, full lips, wearing heather gray gray fleece jacket (fitted fit, long sleeves, zip collar neck), black black hiking pants (fitted fit, full length), heather gray gray fleece jacket (casual), brown brown hiking boots (athletic), smiling, backpack, sporty style, outdoorsy aesthetic , high quality , detailed character design , consistent style , professional illustration headshot , head and shoulders view

core: medium-dark blonde wavy hair, low ponytail
notes: Hair color phrased as 'medium dark blonde' is slightly ambiguous (between medium and dark blonde).
